name: Fireball
description: A burst of fire explodes in a 20-ft.-radius spread, dealing 1d6 fire damage per caster level (max 10d6). Reflex save for half.

name: Magic Missile
description: Unerring missiles of magical force strike targets, dealing 1d4+1 damage each. Caster can fire 1 missile per 2 levels (max 5).

name: Lightning Bolt
description: A bolt of electricity strikes in a 120-ft. line, dealing 1d6 electricity damage per caster level (max 10d6). Reflex save for half.

name: Acid Arrow (Melf's Acid Arrow)
description: A glowing arrow of acid strikes a target, dealing 2d4 acid damage per round for the duration. No saving throw, but requires a ranged touch attack.
